message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the price of $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and I'm open to discussing this further.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget of $8,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a very competitive price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $11,000?
